## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have removed all `console.log()` and debug statements
- [ ] My code has no linting errors (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] I have checked for potential security vulnerabilities

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions/classes

### Database

- [ ] No database migrations needed
- [ ] Database migrations added and tested
- [ ] Migrations are reversible (down migration included)

### Dependencies

- [ ] No new dependencies added
- [ ] New dependencies are necessary and documented
- [ ] Package versions are locked (no `^` or `~`)

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] No breaking changes
- [ ] Breaking changes documented in PR description
- [ ] Migration guide provided
